description.value:
Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. The dweller in darkness behaves in all ways as if you had cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{Phantasmal Killer}. At 17th level, the dweller in darkness can be perceived by more than one creature, as if you had cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{Weird}.

You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.
